plot: First version of Saratchandra's novel. Despite the 'theatrical ruggedness' the film was well scripted and showed a distinct Bengali touch as against the 'Madan' style.
title: Devdas
plot_es: First version of Saratchandra's novel. Despite the 'theatrical ruggedness' the film was well scripted and showed a distinct Bengali touch as against the 'Madan' style.
